title: Taking adalimumab with other medicines and herbal supplements
description: NHS medicines information on possible interactions with adalimumab and other medicines, herbal remedies and supplements.
cleaned_text: Cautions with other medicines Do not take adalimumab with medicines that can increase the risk of serious infections, including: - live vaccinations - some vaccines use live viruses - these include mumps vaccines](/conditions/vaccinations/flu-influenza-vaccine/). If you need a vaccine always check with your doctor or pharmacist whether it is suitable for you - abatacept, a medicine to treat autoimmune diseases - anakinra, a medicine to treat rheumatoid arthritis Mixing adalimumab with herbal remedies and supplements There's not enough information to say that [herbal remedies](/conditions/herbal-medicines/) or supplements are safe to take with adalimumab. They're not tested in the same way as pharmacy and prescription medicines. They're generally not tested for the effect they have on other medicines. Important: Medicine safety Tell your doctor or pharmacist if you're taking any other medicines, including herbal remedies, vitamins or supplements.
